name: Vine Silver Extra Large Satchel
description:
Dream up a wanderlust look with this vine floral pattern purse. The pastel colors and silver trim are charmingly eclectic, making it a perfect carryall for every day use, a fancy lunch meeting, or day trip, with plenty of space for all of your needs.
  • textured batik fabric
  • top zipper
  • tubular top handle with a 6 1/4" drop
  • luscious microfiber suede lining
  • zip compartment at center
  • inside pockets
  • approx. measurement: 18"W x 9.5"H x 5"D
  • linen dust bag with screen printed sketch
P.S. All our bags are handcrafted from 100% authentic batik and reclaimed leather, making each piece one-of-a-kind. P.P.S. The colors on the photos may differ slightly from actual product, depends on monitor settings.

name: Lavender Silver Extra Large Satchel
description:
Put a little metallic in your spring step with our Lavender pattern extra large satchel. A carryall that is perfect for every day use, a fancy lunch meeting, or day trip, with plenty of space for all of your needs. The batik featured here is a classic Indonesian pattern called "Parang" - which means the "sword". It has a bold geometric pattern, and the colors and the shape remind us of the classic lavender. Completed with a gorgeous silver metallic leather trim.

  • top zipper
  • tubular top handle with a 6 1/4" drop

name: Kaleidoscope Batik Mini Satchel
description:
Seen On Refinery29 Exotic, colorful, and vibrant palette that sends you straight to the eye-catching A list. A century old batik design called "sekar jagat" which means the universe or milky way done in muted modern colors. This pattern reminds us of garden designs and it simulates a beautiful kaleidoscope effect. Completed with a refined pop of chartreuse neon leather trim.
  • textured batik fabric
  • top zipper
  • top handle with a 5 1/2" drop
  • luscious microfiber suede lining
  • inside pockets

name: Champagne Mango Front-Pocket Shoulder Bag
description:
Soft leather with the perfect shimmer and a calming color combos. This front pocket shoulder bag is made with an metallic champagne genuine leather, trimmed with an ultra-special batik. The batik is hand-dyed with extract of mango leaves, giving it that natural and earthy colors!
